data.actual_result: the servers or the roles will get really far from one another with huge spaces between them
data.expected_result: it should rearrange the server or the role in the way you wanted
data.short_description: Problem with rearrangement of roles or servers(sorting)
data.steps_to_repro: - go to server sorting/role manager - Try dragging a role or server from the bottom to the top of the server list or role list - You will see what happens
